author: Margaret Chapman
title: Raw Citrus Turmeric Shots [Vegan, Gluten-Free]
text:
February 22, 2017 LIKE OGP ON FACEBOOK : These citrus turmeric shots are quick, easy, and incredibly healthy. Turmeric is famed for its anti-inflammatory properties but it also brightens your teeth and skin. Plus, the citrus mixes wonderfully with the turmeric so these shots taste great. Raw Citrus Turmeric Shots [Vegan, Gluten-Free] This Recipe is : Measure your filtered water into a mason jar. Freshly squeeze your lemons and lime. Add your turmeric and stir the mixture until it’s evenly distributed. Refrigerate to chill and shake the mixture well before pouring. EXPLORE MORE VEGAN RECIPES WITH THESE INGREDIENTS
